TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 将 对象从一种数据类型转换成另一种数据类型。

span.span: Converts objects from one data type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型转换器用于转换数据类型之间的值。A type converter is used to convert values between data types. 类型转换器还支持在设计时属性配置，通过提供文本值的转换或用户可以从选择的值的列表。A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from. 访问类通过类通过调用方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要转换到和从字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to convert a to and from a string. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowFontStringConversion`方法时处理该窗体的事件，并传递 e 作为。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowFontStringConversion` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: This method returns if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的类型转换为字符串类型。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 默认实现调用对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为字符串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.

span.span: The conversion was not successful.

returns.span: 可用于创建具有可更改属性的不可更改对象。

span.span: useful for creating non-changeable objects that have changeable properties.
